Subskills.name: White Dwarf Star
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by supernova.

Subskills.name: Particle Outflux
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple fire balls bouncing between targets on hit inflicting burning.

Subskills.name: Penetrating Blast
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict elemental break on hit.

Subskills.name: Chained Explosions
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional supernova.

Subskills.name: Fight the Gravity
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of supernova.

Subskills.name: Chain Reactions
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a fiery blast on hit dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Planetary Collision
Subskills.description: Chance to rain scorching comets from the sky at monsters on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Fiery Frenzy
Subskills.description: Gain increased fire skill damage for a short duration when using supernova.

Subskills.name: Blast Right Trough
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Targeted Cosmic Event
Subskills.description: Supernova can be casted on target location with increased cast range.

Subskills.name: Solar Shockwave
Subskills.description: Supernova knocks monsters back with force dealing increased damage and slowing them.

Subskills.name: Connected by Sun
Subskills.description: Unleash trails of flaming fire towards monsters on hit dealing a portion of the damage.
